abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart examines apps that help people learn about and reduce their home water consumption.
lead_paragraph: Some of these apps help track one’s own water use, while others make it easy to publicly shame water wasters.

headline.main: Video Feature: As California Thirsts, These Apps Help Save Water
headline.print_headline: Gentle Nudges to Turn Water Guzzlers Into Sippers

snippet: Some of these apps help track one’s own water use, while others make it easy to publicly shame water wasters.
